summary: This document is an email review report from July 28, 2019, concerning a search for emails related to Efrain Reyes. It identifies an email sent by the USMS to BOP employees on August 8, 2019, and notes discrepancies in the email production, with several recipients' emails missing from the provided records. The report details follow-up searches for specific individuals' emails within a date range.

persons.name: Efrain Reyes
persons.context: The email review is conducted regarding search criteria related to Efrain Reyes, indicating he is a person of interest in the document's context.

persons.name: Reese
persons.context: Reese was informed that no emails were provided for a specific individual during the email review process.

events.title: Email review for Efrain Reyes
events.description: An email review was conducted to identify emails related to Efrain Reyes, uncovering an email sent by USMS to BOP employees on August 8, 2019, and noting production discrepancies.

events.title: USMS email to BOP employees
events.description: The USMS sent an email to a number of BOP employees, which was later reviewed during the investigation into Efrain Reyes.

events.title: Email review for specific individuals
events.description: Emails for specific individuals were reviewed, and it was found that the key email was not located, with other emails saved to a folder.

keyFacts: An email review on July 28, 2019, identified a USMS email from August 8, 2019, sent to BOP employees, relevant to a search for Efrain Reyes.
Several recipients of the August 8, 2019, email were missing from the email production, with reasons including one being a GEO employee (not BOP) and another separated from the agency in July 2019.
The missing email was located among 'Deleted Items' folders, suggesting it was not excluded due to deletion.
Follow-up requests for emails from five individuals between August 5-16, 2019, were made, with one Special Agent reporting no emails in her account for those dates.
The document highlights potential issues in email record-keeping or production within the BOP/USMS related to the Efrain Reyes investigation.
